titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/14/2011--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects specified named Members to the following House Committees: (1) Agriculture, (2) Transportation and Infrastructure, and (3) Ways and Means.
